actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.ashwin.fri.pacman.Game
Move the actors within the grid and perform collision detection between actors.
Actor - Class in com.ashwin.fri.pacman.actor
Actors are the superclass of all movable objects in PacMan (aka PacMan and ghosts).
Actor(Point2D, AnimatedSprite, Actor.Orientation, double) - Constructor for class com.ashwin.fri.pacman.actor.Actor
 
Actor.Orientation - Enum in com.ashwin.fri.pacman.actor
 
addActionListener(ActionListener) - Method in class com.ashwin.fri.pacman.Game
Add an action listener to the timer so that other classes can get updates from when the game refreshes.
adjacent(Point2D, Actor.Orientation, double) - Method in class com.ashwin.fri.pacman.grid.Grid
Returns the center Point2D of the tile in the specified direction that is dist tiles away.
adjacent(Actor, double) - Method in class com.ashwin.fri.pacman.grid.Grid
 
AnimatedSprite - Class in com.ashwin.fri.pacman.display
Animated sprites are associated with actors and have additional properties that allow them to be animated and oriented.
